reviewText: I just watched the first DVD (i ordered both)and its AMAZING!!  the graphics are fantastic and the animation is so twisted  i was so tired when i put the first one on but didn't want to sleep i had to stay up and watch the second i was immediately addicted soooo goood!!!
Amazing artwork and an epic story! Lance Henrikson is as gravel throated as ever. A brilliant way of connecting comics & DVD. It's the future of comics, add it to your collection.

Yes! The much discussed series kicks off with a real bang (or post-bang if we are discussing the narrative). I expect this to become our generations "Watchmen", Alan Moore should be very jealous. Like Watchmen: it is violent, sexy, full of meaning, compelling, and a wake up call. You heard it hear first, Godkiller is going to be huge. Buy this now so you can say you were in the know in the beginning. Much like the release of the Watchmen motion comics Watchmen: The Complete Motion Comic (+ Digital Copy and BD-Live) [Blu-ray] this series (which was conceived before the the motion comics were released) will defy genres with its print comic/motion comic crossover narrative. While my only sadness is that has yet to be released on Blu-ray. These images are beautifully illustrated by Anna Muckcracker, and deserve to be in HD. Harass Halo 8 for them to release it on Blu-ray!
